sense.name: be immersed in
sense.commentary: Syntax includes: NP1[theme] WELTER NP2[location] NP1[location] WELTER NP2[theme]
sense.examples: Hussein weltered in blood and dust for the sake of truth. English, French, and Indians weltered in seas of blood. Geologic monsters weltered in the primal deep. He weltered here in the sunny ooze. He an imagination which welters in impotence. The water 'neath welkin weltered with gore.
